title: NFL getting closer to expanded playoffs, 17-game regular season (Football 2/21)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss the proposed changes to the NFL's CBA. The guys dissect the possibility of an expanded postseason (5:20) and also the possible addition of a 17th game to the regular season schedule (23:30). Then, the Pick Six Superfriends answer 5-star reviews left on Apple Podcasts (35:00).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
